Sentencas: Direct internal and external reforming operations on Ni-samaria-doped ceria (SDC) anode with the practical size solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) at intermediate temperatures from 600 to 750 degrees C are carried out to reveal the reforming activities and the electrochemical activities, being compared with the hydrogen-fueled power generation.
Titulo: Steam reforming on Ni-samaria-doped ceria cermet anode for practical size solid oxide fuel cell at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: The cell performance with direct internal and external steam reforming of methane and their limiting current densities were almost the same irrespective of the progress of reaction in the methane reformate at 700 and 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Steam reforming on Ni-samaria-doped ceria cermet anode for practical size solid oxide fuel cell at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: The durability test for 5.5 h at 750 degrees C with direct internal reforming operation confirmed that the cell performance did not deteriorate.
Titulo: Steam reforming on Ni-samaria-doped ceria cermet anode for practical size solid oxide fuel cell at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: The operation temperature of the cell controlled the reforming activities on the anode, and the large size electrode gave rise to high conversion due to the slow space velocity of the steam reforming.
Titulo: Steam reforming on Ni-samaria-doped ceria cermet anode for practical size solid oxide fuel cell at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: Direct internal steam reforming attained sufficient level of conversion for SOFC power generation with methane at 700 and 750 degrees C on the large Ni-SDC cermet anode.
Titulo: Steam reforming on Ni-samaria-doped ceria cermet anode for practical size solid oxide fuel cell at intermediate temperatures
